text: Y Jathan Sadowski @jathansadowski | coined a term on @machinekillspod that | feel like needs its own essay: Habsburg Al - a system that is so heavily trained on the outputs of other generative Al's that it becomes an inbred mutant, likely with exaggerated, grotesque features. It joins the lineage of Potemkin Al. 1:29 PM - Feb 13, 2023 - 61.7K Views
